name: Heist of Kharon
description:
Inspired by Super Crate Box, Heist Of Kharon is single level shooting mayhem. Steal Obols from the realm of Kharon.

More Obols stolen, harder it gets!

Two Levels of difficulty:

Hard and

Nightmare - Bullets hit the platforms,  more & faster enemies

Controls: A D - Move, W - Jump, Left Mouse - Shoot

Made for Ludum Dare 40:  The more you have, the worse it is.

Note:  PostLD build has integrated Online Leaderboard. Everything else is same as LD build.
